isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - LONG SLEEPER LOWER SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: LONG SLEEPER LOWER SIDE TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel on Long Sleeper Cab

step1.para:
If so equipped, remove passenger side air line cabinets, refer to
LONG SLEEPER AIR LINE CABINETS
.

Remove sleeper window assembly rubber trim (Item 5, Figure 83)
from around window opening of lower side trim panel (Item 2, Figure 81) , passenger side shown. Lay sleeper window assembly rubber trim out of the way and save for installation.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 81 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 1), these fasteners go through the lower side trim panel (Item 2) and the center trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.
Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 4) across the top of lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.
Remove two push-in fasteners (Item 5) just below sleeper window, passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 81. Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel on Long Sleeper Cab

note.para:
You will need to remove three push-in fasteners (Items 1, Figure 82)
on the left side of back trim panel (Items 2, Figure 82)
to access the remaining three push-in fasteners (Items 6, Figure 82)
of the lower side trim panel (Items 2, Figure 81)
as follows.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 82 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 1) on left side of back trim panel (Item 2). Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 82. Passenger Side Lower Side Trim Panel and Back Trim Panel on Long Sleeper Cab

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 81 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Pull left side of back trim panel (Item 2, Figure 82)
out to access hidden push-in fasteners (Item 6). Remove three push-in fasteners (Item 6) along the rear of lower side trim panel (Item 3), passenger side shown. Lay push-in fasteners out of the way and save for installation.
Once all the push-in fasteners have been removed, remove lower side trim panel (Item 3). Lay lower side trim panel out of the way and save for installation.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side lower side trim panel on long sleeper cab.
